mapper.sql: ddkh.id AS "id", ddkh.kn_user_id AS "knUserId", ddkh.zfzr AS "zfzrid", ddkh.sxsjhwcrq as "sxsjhwcrq", ddkh.sxsydrq as "sxsydrq",ddkh.sxspz as "sxspz",ddkh.sxswczt as "sxswczt" ,knuser.xlxm as "xlxm", knuser.xnxm as "xnxm",sysuser.name as "zfzr"
mapper.select:
select
from kn_ddkh ddkh left join kn_user knuser on ddkh.kn_user_id = knuser.id left join sys_user sysuser on ddkh.zfzr = sysuser.user_id where knuser.zt=3
and (xlxm like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.xlxm},'%') or xnxm like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.xlxm},'%') )

select
from kn_ddkh ddkh left join kn_user knuser on ddkh.kn_user_id = knuser.id left join sys_user sysuser on ddkh.zfzr = sysuser.user_id where knuser.zt=3 and ddkh.id=#{paramCondition.id}
